articles.description: Pakistan vs England: Haider Ali played a pull shot off Richard Gleeson and it hit umpire Aleem Dar on the thigh as he tried desperately to get out of the way.
articles.content: Umpire Aleem Dar suffered an unfortunate injury during the sixth T20I between Pakistan and England in Lahore on Friday as Haider Ali rammed a pull shot straight into him. Dar was the leg umpire in th… [+1320 chars]
